great movie wall to wall boobs
Movies was Awesome....and at last 3D Concept was Excellent....Great Movie....lol
Using VLC player and could'nt get anything other than sound track properly.There is a faint verbal sound track when u muck about with the settings, but a waste of dl

Using VLC player and could'nt get anything other than sound track properly.There is a faint verbal sound track when u muck about with the settings, but a waste of dl...Dont know what @Sunzoo is on but can I have some.....

After a little more investigation, I found that VLC is not the preferred player for this up. Download the k-lite codec pack(just google k-lite),plays just about everything and its freeware....So thanks for the up  deffjam555......an oldie but a goody

@Ausdemon  and anyone else having audio problems this has 5+1 audio if You're watching it on a stereo system you need to downmix the audio to stereo there should be an option in vlc to select the number of output channels. I use ffdshow and in the audio config check mixer and select stereo.
